result.execSummary:
The defendant Ronald J Hecht was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Any cash bonds posted in 15CM70,15CF79,15CF195,15CF198 and 15CF284 are to be applied to any Restitution owed and any remaining about to be applied towards court costs in any of the cases.    If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.
Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent. Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge.
AODA and comply with recommended follow-up treatment.

Statement of read-in on Eau Claire County Case 15CM1013

Clerked by SM. 
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CM70, 15CF79, 15CF96, 15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197, 15CF198, 15CF284, 15CF285
Summary provided by State. 
Court questions Defendant.  
15CM70 - Count 1 - Defendant pleads guilty.  Court accepts plea and finds guilty.  Counts 2 & 3 - dismissed and read-in.
15CF79 - State moves to amend Count 1 to misdemeanor battery - 940.19(1) with domestic abuse enhancer.  Court grants amendment to count 1 with the domestic abuse enhancer.  Defendant pleads guilty, Court accepts and finds guilty.  Court dismisses and reads in count 2.
15CF96 - Entire case dismissed and read-in.  Defense has no objection to using cash bond posted towards restitution in other cases.  Court orders $1,000.00 posted be applied to restitution in other cases.
15CF195 Defendant pleads guilty to count 1, Court accepts and finds defendant guilty.  Court dismisses and reads in  counts 2 - 6.  Court orders $2,500.00 cash bond be posted to be used first to restitution in any case.
15CF196 & 15CF197 - Entire cases dismissed and read-in.
15CF198 - Defendant pleads guilty to count 1 & 2, Court accepts and finds guilty of both counts.
15CF284 - Defendant pleads guilty to count 1, Court accepts and finds guilty.  Court dismisses and reads-in counts 2 -4.
15CF285 - Entire case is dismissed and read-in.
Eau Claire County read-in to be filed in 15CF198.  Court dismisses and reads in Eau Claire County case 15CM1013.
Barron County uncharged read-ins on summary sheet, restitution will be ordered. 
Court revokes bond.  PSI ordered on felony cases only.  15CM70 will be sentenced at same time as felony cases.
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 1, 2015 at 08:00 am.
